Publications

Arab News - The Leading National English Newspaper

Launched in April of 1975 in Jeddah, Arab News is the first publication of the Group. Arab News is a leading English language newspaper in the Kingdom and the GCC. The newspaper is of diversified content, covering politics, social issues, economic and business news, as well as sports and entertainment. The paper targets English-speaking individuals in the GCC and the Arab world. No major local competitors currently exist.

History

  • Launched in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia 1975
  • Target : English Executive Readers
  • No other newspaper in KSA reach this target
  • Saudi Arabia’s First English Daily
  • Published by Saudi Research & Publishing Company (www.srpc.com), one of Saudi Research & Marketing Group Companies
  • Editor in Chief – Mohammed Al Harthi
  • Language : English
